svcgroupplayernames.configuration.onlySh: If enabled, player names will only be displayed when the respective player is talking.
svcgroupplayernames.configuration.transp: Sets the transparency of the player names when the respective player is talking. 0 is fully transparent, 100 is fully opaque.
Sets the transparency of the player names when the respective player is not talking. 0 is fully transparent, 100 is fully opaque.
svcgroupplayernames.configuration.useTex: Draw a dark outline around player names for better visibility against any background.
